Hero.title: Oliva Beach Apartment
Hero.subtitle: Your seaside escape in Molinell, Spain

About.title: About the Apartment
About.text1: Enjoy the perfect sunrise right over the sea and a pleasant holiday atmosphere in our stylish apartment in Oliva. Located in the quiet Molinell area, right next to the beautiful Platja la Devesa and camping Pepe. A short walk through the dunes takes you directly to the sea.
About.text2: Outside our generous terrace overlooking the sea, you are steps away from restaurants, supermarkets, and the beach. The apartment offers a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable furnishings, and everything you need for a carefree holiday.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.note: * Prices are indicative and may vary depending on specific dates and holidays. Long term price excludes energy costs.

Resort.title: Resort Amenities
Resort.subtitle: Everything you need for a perfect holiday
Resort.text: Our apartment is part of a beautiful resort complex featuring large swimming pools, well-maintained gardens, and secure parking. It's the perfect place to relax after a day at the beach.
